tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PolicyStorage (
    policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_id UUID,
    policy_definition TEXT,
    action_selection_strategy TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE AgentLogs (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	agent_id INT,
	episode INT,
	action_taken VARCHAR(255),
	reward_received DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE learned_policies (
  policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_name VARCHAR(255),
  policy_description TEXT,
  state_space JSONB,
  action_space JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE action_strategies (
  strategy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
  strategy_description TEXT,
  strategy_parameters JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE agent_history (
  agent_id UUID,
  episode_id UUID,
  state_history JSONB,
  action_history JSONB,
  reward_history JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE agent_rewards (
  agent_id UUID,
  policy_id UUID,
  total_rewards DOUBLE PRECISION
)

CREATE TABLE environment_states (
  state_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  state_description TEXT,
  state_actions JSONB
)
